products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Sage
products.body_html: The Sage Arch Yoga Mat features a unique arch shape for better alignment and flow, made from recycled PU and natural tree rubber. With non-slip grip and dense cushioning, it offers sustainable support for regular and hot yoga.

products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Firestone
products.body_html: The Firestone Arch Yoga Mat features a unique arch shape to support natural movement and enhance stability. Made from recycled PU and natural tree rubber, it offers non-slip grip, joint-friendly cushioning, and sustainable performance for all styles of yoga.

products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Moonbeam
products.body_html: The Arch Shaped Moonbeam Mat is designed for comfort and alignment with its unique arch shape. Made from recycled PU and natural rubber, it offers a non-slip surface, joint support, and eco-friendly performance for mindful movement.

products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Earthstone
products.body_html: Experience comfort and balance with our Arch Shaped Recycled PU Yoga Mat—crafted from eco-conscious recycled PU and natural tree rubber for non-slip grip, joint support, and mindful movement. Its curved design promotes alignment and flow in every practice.

products.title: Cork Yoga Mat - Chakra
products.body_html: Designed with a detailed hand-drawn chakra motif, this mat combines eco-friendly cork and rubber for durability, grip, and joint-friendly comfort.

featured_image.alt: Shakti Warrior Chakra Cork Yoga Mat - Elevate balance and tranquility with this inspiring, eco-friendly mat. Order now for a mindful yoga experience!

products.title: Cork Yoga Mat - Sahasrara
products.body_html: Elevate your practice with our Black Sahasrara Cork Yoga Mat—featuring a hand-drawn Crown Chakra design on eco-friendly, non-slip cork for natural grip, durability, and grounding support. Crafted for mindful movement and sustainable living.

products.title: TPE Yoga Mat - Akasa
products.body_html: Crafted from recycled plastic with 6mm cushioning, this vibrant mat features a dreamcatcher design to uplift your practice with grip, comfort, and joy.

products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Chakra
products.body_html: Step into serenity with the Chakra Recycled PU Yoga Mat—featuring a radiant gold chakra design on an ivory recycled PU surface and a natural tree rubber base. Enjoy non-slip grip, joint support, and eco-conscious performance for regular and hot yoga.

products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Anahata
products.body_html: Flow with calm and balance on the Heart Chakra Recycled PU Yoga Mat—featuring an Anahata-inspired design on eco-friendly recycled PU and natural tree rubber for grip, support, and mindful movement

products.title: Hemp Yoga Mat - Sahasrara
products.body_html: The mat is made from sustainable hemp and features a detailed Sahasrara Crown design, representing unity and focus. Built for grip, support, and conscious practice

products.title: Recycled PU Yoga Mat - Sahasrara
products.body_html: Unveil the elegance of the Sahasrara Recycled PU Yoga Mat—featuring a lotus-inspired design on a sleek black recycled PU surface with natural tree rubber. With a wider base for stability, it’s ideal for both regular and hot yoga.

products.title: Hemp Yoga Mat - Anahata
products.body_html: Embrace balance with the Anahata Hemp Yoga Mat—crafted from 100% sustainable hemp and natural rubber for sweat-activated grip and joint support. Ideal for hot yoga, its green design reflects the heart chakra, symbolizing love and harmony.

products.title: Cork Yoga Mat - Shivshakti
products.body_html: Step onto the Shakti Warrior Cork Yoga Mat with its majestic Tiger Design—symbolizing strength, balance, and resilience. Crafted for power and performance with eco-friendly materials and enhanced grip for every practice.

products.title: Recycled Suede Yoga Mat - Sacred
products.body_html: The Sacred Geometry Yoga Mat features a meaningful design symbolizing universal energy, crafted from natural tree rubber and recycled microfiber suede for cushioned support and sweat-activated grip.

products.title: Recycled Suede Yoga Mat - Ajna
products.body_html: Elevate your practice with the Ajna Pro Yoga Mat—crafted from recycled microfiber suede and natural tree rubber for extra cushioning, sweat-activated grip, and an Ajna chakra-inspired design. Eco-friendly, durable, and free from harmful substances.

featured_image.alt: Ajna Rubber Yoga Mat. Eco-friendly, with recycled microfiber suede and sustainable tree rubber, it offers excellent cushioning, and a non-slip grip, that is activated more with sweat. Immerse in a fusion of design and functionality.

products.title: Recycled Suede Yoga Mat - Kundalini
products.body_html: Ignite your practice with the Kundalini Design Yoga Mat—featuring an artful design inspired by awakening energy. Made with recycled suede and natural tree rubber, it offers joint support, non-slip grip, and lasting durability.

featured_image.alt: Shakti Warrior has hand designed eco-friendly, organic yoga mats. They are non-slip, high quality, with good cushioning for the joints, portable and durable.
